name: Trantor Inc.
tagline: Experts in Fintech, CoE, AI & Product Development
description:
Trantor provides innovative solutions to enhance customer experience and help clients achieve their business goals. We have eight Centers of Excellence providing customized solutions in web, mobile, cloud, business intelligence, data, and testing. We are a dual-shore service provider, specialized in internalizing our clients’ business processes and their business objectives.
 
Our portfolio includes leading brands from different domains of finance, retail, social, healthcare, tourism, technology, consulting and more. Some of our customers are CAN Capital, Genpact, Bank of The West, Speazie, Fry’s Electronics, LaJolla, Lending Point, VMware.
We are an ISO 9001:2008 Certified company with processes in line with CMMI Level standards. Trantor is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, ADOBE Solution Partner, Oracle Silver Partner, AWS Partner. We ranked 201 among America’s fastest growing private companies for the year 2016, in the annual survey by Inc. Magazine.
 
Trantor offers a wide range of expertise:
Software Development: RoR, ASP.Net, PHP, Java and Python -=
Mobile App Development: iOS, Android and HTML5
Software Testing: Manual, Automated, API and Security testing services
Ecommerce Development: Hybris, Magento, WooCommerce and Custom development
CMS: Adobe Experience Manager, SiteCore and WordPress
Data: BI & Data Analysis; Big Data, Warehousing, Business Intelligence, Data mining and analysis.
 
Follow us:
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/trantor/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Trantorinc
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TrantorInc
